blocks.content: I’m a creative problem solver with five years of experience working in Technology, Design, and Photography. I have advanced knowledge of visual design and the ability to apply it in a programming context.

I have a strong ability for self-directed learning and a history of applying this to make successful contributions to companies in a variety of fields. My coworkers describe me as hardworking, passionate, and reliable.
I have a special interest in Front End technologies and the JavaScript Ecosystem, and most of my professional experience has involved writing code in React.js and GraphQL.
Links to my personal programming projects and experience can be found at:
JavaScript
I am well-versed in modern, ES6 JavaScript and its core attendant technologies (HTML, CSS).
React
This is the JavaScript library with which I have the most professional experience. I currently spend most of the work week writing React.
Javascript Libraries
I have worked with other common Front End libraries including Bootstrap, Sass, Styled Components, Apollo Server/Client, RabbitMQ/AMQPLib, and D3.
Node.js and GraphQL

I have some experience writing Back End JavaScript, as I was heavily involved in creating and maintaining a GraphQL server to act as an aggregation layer between the project’s Front End and its existing REST API.
Git
It’s the industry standard of version control technology and I use it almost every day.
Agile Development
Agile is an effective and popular tool for writing software in a collaborative context, and I know how to work in an Agile team.
Strong ability for self-study
Programming requires an open mind and a willingness to maintain your skillset with new learning. I have the drive and discipline required to do this.
Business Development

I understand what it takes to create a new business from scratch and have obtained a solid grounding in several related skills as a result. These include marketing (especially online), managing subcontractors, sales, strategic thinking, and leadership.
Critical Thinking

I understand that in order to produce successful work, you need to be open to criticism and review. This is true for any creative field, but it is especially true for programming. I have experience giving and taking criticism, as well as applying it to improve my work.
Copy Writing
I have a high level of skill with written English and can write well on any subject given enough time for research.
